Description: IN - You have failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare at work of your employees and others in that risks (including fire and explosion) from hazardous substances eg flammables, corrosives and organic peroxides in the storage/mixing room, are reduced by applying control and mitigation measures to ensure the substances are stored and used in suitably constructed facilities with regard to containment, separation, ventilation and ignition sources.
